name: HSP_ACCT_LETTERS
description: This table contains hospital billing letters information from the Notes (HNO) master file.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LETTER_SENT_DATE
columns.description: The date the letter was sent.

columns.name: LET_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who created the letter.

columns.name: LET_CREATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor account that is associated with this letter. This is only populated for letters sent at the guarantor account level.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account that is associated with this letter. This is only populated for letters sent at the hospital account level.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the liability bucket that is associated with this letter. This is only populated for letters sent at the liability bucket level.
